  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111234</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111234</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Iz česa je?</string>
            <string language="en">What is it made of?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Von was wird es gebildet?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">De quoi est-il fait ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que é feito?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Di che cosa è fatto?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι αποτελείται από;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué se hace?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenec prepoznava predmete iz svojega okolja in materiale, iz katerih so. Spoznava vzroke za uporabo materialov.</string>
            <string language="en">Describing the objects in the environment and determining why the substance that object consist of was used.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">snov</string>
            <string language="en">substance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">material</string>
            <string language="en">material</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prepoznavanje</string>
            <string language="en">recognition</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestehen aus, das Beschreiben der Nachrichten in der 
Umgebung und die Bestimmung, warum die Substanz, die einwenden, wurden
verwendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décrire les objets dans l'environnement et la 
détermination pourquoi la substance qui objectent se composent ont 
été utilisés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrever os objetos no ambiente e determinar porque a 
substância que objetam consiste foram usadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrivendo gli oggetti nell'ambiente e determinare 
perchè la sostanza che obiettano consiste di sono state usate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφή των αντικειμένων στο περιβάλλον και 
καθορισμός γιατί η ουσία ότι το αντικείμενο αποτελείται από 
χρησιμοποιήθηκε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Describir los objetos en el ambiente y la determinación 
de porqué la sustancia que se oponen consiste en fueron utilizadas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Substanz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Material</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anerkennung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">substance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">matériel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">identification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">substância</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">material</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">recognition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sostanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">materiale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riconoscimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ουσία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υλικό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αναγνώριση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sustancia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">material</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reconocimiento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
